name: General Store Simulator
description:
OPEN FOR BUSINESS!

A simulation game where the player runs their own general store. They can purchase supplies to restock their shelves. Customers will come and go to see if there is something they want to buy.  With the money earned, you can also expand by building more shelves to hold more goods!

Since it's the first version, there are bound to be some issues but just try to have fun and see how much money you can stockpile!

Not sure about the future of this game/project, but if you like it or any inquiries please email me at chuntaolinprogrammer@gmail.com.

Follow me on Twitter: @PandaKing550
